org.forgerock.openam.authentication.service.protocol

Class RemoteSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.authentication.service.protocol.RemoteSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.http.HttpSession

    public class RemoteSession
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.http.HttpSession, Serializable
    Facade for the standard servlet HttpSession object.
    Author:
    Steve Ferris steve.ferris@forgerock.com
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteSession

        public RemoteSession(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Construct a new session facade. This class wraps the standard HttpSession object allowing it to become serializable.
        Parameters:
        session - The HttpSession object to be wrapped

      • RemoteSession

        public RemoteSession()
        Construct a new session facade. Used on the remote end post deserialization

        public Object getAttribute(String name)
        Fetch the value of a given session attribute, either from local object pre serialization or the stored value post serialization. Only attributes that were serializable will be available post serialization
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
